prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Guitar, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
This piece has Bass, Chromatic Percussion, Drums, and Guitar, but Piano is not part of it.
